description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. Graduate in cognitive science, Yeehaa combines creativity and analytical skills in roles of innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design. Wrote 'Align the Misaligned,' advocating for 'ecosystem architecture' and vibrant digital ecosystems. Enthusiastic about impactful solutions.
blurb: Fragmentation of the internet mirrors Earth's tectonic shifts and exploitative tech practices. Embracing fragmented systems, 'ecosystem architecture' aims for creating vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
